refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: GnomePrintConfig; GnomePrintConfig* gnome_print_config_default (void); GnomePrintConfig* gnome_print_config_ref (GnomePrintConfig *config); GnomePrintConfig* gnome_print_config_unref (GnomePrintConfig *config); GnomePrintConfig* gnome_print_config_dup (GnomePrintConfig *config); guchar* gnome_print_config_get (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key); gboolean gnome_print_config_set (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, const guchar *value); gboolean gnome_print_config_get_boolean (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gboolean *val); gboolean gnome_print_config_get_int (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gint *val); gboolean gnome_print_config_get_double (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gdouble *val); gboolean gnome_print_config_get_length (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gdouble *val, const GnomePrintUnit **unit); gboolean gnome_print_config_set_boolean (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gboolean val); gboolean gnome_print_config_set_int (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gint val); gboolean gnome_print_config_set_double (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gdouble val); gboolean gnome_print_config_set_length (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gdouble val, const GnomePrintUnit *unit); void gnome_print_config_dump (GnomePrintConfig *gpc); #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_SIZE #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_WIDTH #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_HEIGHT #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_ORIENTATION #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_ORIENTATION_MATRIX #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_ORIENTATION #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_ORIENTATION_MATRIX #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_ORIENTATION #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_LAYOUT #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_LAYOUT_WIDTH #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_LAYOUT_HEIGHT #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION_DPI #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION_DPI_X #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION_DPI_Y #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_NUM_COPIES #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_COLLATE #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_LEFT #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_RIGHT #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_TOP #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_BOTTOM #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_LEFT #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_RIGHT #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_TOP #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_BOTTOM #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_OUTPUT_FILENAME #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_DOCUMENT_NAME #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PREFERED_UNIT

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_default ()
refsect2.para: Creates a GnomePrintConfig object with the default printer and settings.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object with the default settings

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_ref ()
refsect2.para: Increase the reference count on the GnomePrintConfig object by one.

listitem.simpara: The GnomePrintConfig object to have its reference count increased
A pointer to the GnomePrintConfig object or NULL on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_unref ()
refsect2.para: Decrease the reference count on the GnomePrintConfig object by one.

listitem.simpara: The GnomePrintConfig object to have its reference count decreased
A pointer to the GnomePrintConfig object or NULL on failure.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_dup ()
refsect2.para: Does a deep copy of the config config. You should unref the returned GnomePrintConfig using gnome_print_config_unref when you are finished using it.

listitem.simpara: The config to be copied
A copy of config

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_get ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of string key from the GnomePrintConfig object. The returned string should be freed with g_free when you are finished with it.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be obtained
The value of the key, NULL indicates failure.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_set ()
refsect2.para: Sets the value of string key in the GnomePrintConfig object to value value.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be set
String containing the value to set
TRUE on success, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_get_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of key key from the GnomePrintConfig object. Converts values such as "true", "y", "yes", and their opposites, to their boolean equivalent. The boolean value will be stored in the variable val.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be obtained
Pointer to a boolean variable to store the value in. Should initially be NULL
TRUE if a value was retrieved, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_get_int ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of key key from the GnomePrintConfig object. Converts values to their integer equivalent. The integer value will be stored in the variable val.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be obtained
Pointer to a integer variable to store the value in. Should initially be NULL
TRUE if a value was retrieved, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_get_double ()
refsect2.para: Gets the value of key key from the GnomePrintConfig object. Converts values to their double equivalent. The double value will be stored in the variable val.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be obtained
Pointer to a double variable to store the value in. Should initially be NULL
TRUE if a value was retrieved, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_get_length ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gnome_print_config_get_length (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gdouble *val, const GnomePrintUnit **unit);
refsect2.para: Gets the value of key key from the GnomePrintConfig object. Converts values to their double equivalent. The double value will be stored in the variable val and the units will be stored in unit. You should allocate the storage for unit before calling this function.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be obtained
Pointer to a double variable to store the value in. Should initially be NULL
Pointer to an already allocated GnomePrintUnit struct
TRUE if a value was retrieved, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_set_boolean ()
refsect2.para: Set a boolean value in the GnomePrintConfig object.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be set
Boolean containing the value to set
TRUE on success, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_set_int ()
refsect2.para: Set an integer value in the GnomePrintConfig object.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be set
Integer containing the value to set
TRUE on success, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_set_double ()
refsect2.para: Set a double value in the GnomePrintConfig object.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be set
Double containing the value to set
TRUE on success, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_set_length ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gnome_print_config_set_length (GnomePrintConfig *config, const guchar *key, gdouble val, const GnomePrintUnit *unit);
refsect2.para: Sets a double value and the units it is using. This should be used in conjunction with gnome_print_config_get_length.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to a GnomePrintConfig object
String containing the path of key whose value is to be set
Double containing the value to set
Units to use when setting value
TRUE on success, FALSE on failure

refsect2.title: gnome_print_config_dump ()
refsect2.para: Print out the tree structure representing the GnomePrintConfig. Output is to STDOUT and is limited to a depth of 20.

listitem.simpara: The GnomePrintConfig to output

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_SIZE
refsect2.programlisting: #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_SIZE "Settings.Output.Media.PhysicalSize" /* Paper name, such as A4 or Letter */
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the paper size, eg: A4, Letter.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_WIDTH
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the width of the paper. Units are arbitrary so use gnome_print_config_get_length and gnome_print_set_length.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_HEIGHT
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the height of the paper. Units are arbitrary so use gnome_print_config_get_length and gnome_print_set_length.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_ORIENTATION
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the orientation of the paper in terms of degrees of rotation, eg: R0, R90, R180, and R270.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_ORIENTATION
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for the key that contains the orientation of the logical page in terms of degrees of rotation, eg: R0, R90, R180, and R270.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_ORIENTATION
refsect2.para: See GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_ORIENTATION.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_LAYOUT
refsect2.programlisting: #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_LAYOUT "Settings.Document.Page.Layout" /* Id of layout ('Plain' is always no-special-layout) */
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the name for the logical layout being used, eg: Plain.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_LAYOUT_WIDTH
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the logical width of the page as used by the application.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_LAYOUT_HEIGHT
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the logical height of the page as used by the application.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains a string representing the resolution of the printer, eg: 300x300 or 300dpi.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION_DPI
refsect2.programlisting: #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION_DPI "Settings.Output.Resolution.DPI" /* Numeric value, like 300, if meaningful */
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains a numeric representation of the resolution, eg: 300.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION_DPI_X
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains a numeric representation of the X resolution, eg: 300.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_RESOLUTION_DPI_Y
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains a numeric representation of the Y resolution, eg: 300.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_NUM_COPIES
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains the number of copies to output.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_COLLATE
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for key that contains a boolean value indicating whether to collate the copies as they are output.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_LEFT
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_RIGHT
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_TOP
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAGE_MARGIN_BOTTOM
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_LEFT
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_RIGHT
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_TOP
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PAPER_MARGIN_BOTTOM
refsect2.para: Ignored by libgnomeprint, but used by libgnomeprintui when populating margin symbols.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_OUTPUT_FILENAME
refsect2.programlisting: #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_OUTPUT_FILENAME "Settings.Output.Job.FileName" /* Filename used when printing to file. */
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for the key that contains the name of the file being used when printing to a file.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_DOCUMENT_NAME
refsect2.programlisting: #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_DOCUMENT_NAME "Settings.Document.Name" /* The name of the document 'Cash flow 2002', `Grandma cookie recipies' */
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for the key that contains the name of the document being printed.

refsect2.title: GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PREFERED_UNIT
refsect2.programlisting: #define GNOME_PRINT_KEY_PREFERED_UNIT "Settings.Document.PreferedUnit" /* Abbreviation for the preferred unit cm, in,... */
refsect2.para: Convenience macro for the key that contains the abbreviation for the units used, eg: cm, in.
